***неудачный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неудачный.html>неуда́чный</a> (6243)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудача.html>неуда́ча</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neudáča</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудачный.html>неуда́чный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neudáčnyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)неуда́чнее</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)неуда́чней</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>unsuccessful, <a href = vnd.unilang:unfortunate.html>unfortunate</a></li>
<li>unlucky</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́ч</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-уда-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ч-н</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</p>
<ol><li>irrepressibly</li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:дер.html>дер</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>жи́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мый</b>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неудивительный.html>неудиви́тельный</a> (11786)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>у·ди<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ви́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>

Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.

<ol><li><span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***неудобно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неудобно.html>неудо́бно</a> (3500)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудобный.html>неудо́бный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neudóbnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудобно.html>неудо́бно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neudóbno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>uncomfortably</li>
<li>inconveniently

<li>uneasily, <a href = vnd.unilang:ill.html>ill</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:at.html>at</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ease.html>ease</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чувствовать.html>чу́вствовал</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>себя́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:там.html>там</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:неудобно.html>неудо́бно</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> čúvstvoval sebjá tam <b>neudóbno</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>he</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:feel.html>felt</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:uneasy.html>uneasy</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:there.html>there</a></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***неудобство.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неудобство.html>неудо́бство</a> (9800)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудобство.html>неудо́бство</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neudóbstvo</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудобство.html>неудо́бства</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудобство.html>неудо́бства</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудобство.html>неудо́бств</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:inconvenience.html>inconvenience</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:discomfort.html>discomfort</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>до́б<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ство</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-удоб-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ств</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствие.html>отсу́тствие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:удобство.html>удо́бства</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:состояние.html>состоя́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неловкость.html>нело́вкости</a>, затруднительности, <a href = vnd.unilang:смущение.html>смуще́ния</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неудовлетворенность.html>неудовлетворённость</a> (19950)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудовлетворенный.html>неудовлетворённый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neudovletvorjónnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ость</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>дов<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>лет</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>рён<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>

***неудовлетворительный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неудовлетворительный.html>неудовлетвори́тельный</a> (23072)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неудовлетворительный.html>неудовлетвори́тельный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neudovletvorítelʹnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:unsatisfactory.html>unsatisfactory</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дов<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тво<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ри́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-удовлетвор-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-и-тельн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***неуемный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуемный.html>неуёмный</a> (18148)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:alternative.html>Alternative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:spell.html>spelling</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуемный.html>неуёмный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neujómnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ём<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>

Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:полный.html>по́лный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сила.html>си́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:энергия.html>эне́ргии</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:неутомимый.html>неутоми́мый</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>Челове́к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:здоровенный.html>здорове́нный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:веселый.html>весёлый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуемный.html>неуёмного</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:упрямство.html>упря́мства</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дело.html>де́ле</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:строение.html>строе́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:новый.html>но́вой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>жи́зни</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BC" class="extiw" title="w:Горький, Максим">Максим <a href = vnd.unilang:горький.html>Го́рький</a></a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:лето.html>Ле́то</a>», <span class="example-date">1909</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; </ol>

***неужели.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неужели.html>неуже́ли</a> (928)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p>Univerbation <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a></span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:not.html>not</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уже.html>уже́</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">užé</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:already.html>already</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:li.html>li</a></span>, <span class="ann-pos"><a href = vnd.unilang:interrogative.html>interrogative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:particle.html>particle</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

***неужто.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неужто.html>неу́жто</a> (5448)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p>Univerbation <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ne-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уж.html>уж</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">už</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-то</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-to</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неужто.html>неу́жто</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neúžto</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:really.html>really</a>?, <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:possible.html>possible</a>?, <a href = vnd.unilang:indeed.html>indeed</a></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:неужто.html>неу́жто</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:частица.html>Части́ца</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-неужто-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="просторечное"><a href = vnd.unilang:простой.html>прост</a>.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="устаревшее">устар.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>употребля́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ответ.html>отве́те</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сообщение.html>сообще́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вызывать.html>вызыва́ет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:удивление.html>удивле́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:изумление.html>изумле́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:недоверие.html>недове́рие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> неудовлетворение, <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствовать.html>соотве́тствуя</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нию</a> сл.: <i><a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:правда.html>правда</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:возможно.html>возмо́жно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a></i> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>Так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сделать.html>сде́лал</a>. ― <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:неужто.html>Неу́жто</a></span>? ― <a href = vnd.unilang:конечно.html>Коне́чно</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:глупость.html>глу́пость</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>был</a> разгорячен. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%94%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%A4%D1%91%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Достоевский, Фёдор Михайлович">Ф. М. Достоевский</a>, « <a href = vnd.unilang:подросток.html>Подро́сток</a>», <span class="example-date">1875</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>Да</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:неужто.html>неу́жто</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:правда.html>пра́вду</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>тебя́</a> Рогожин <a href = vnd.unilang:сказать.html>сказа́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>три</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:целковый.html>целко́вых</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:васильевский.html>Васи́льевский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остров.html>О́стров</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ползок.html>ползко́м</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:доползти.html>доползёшь</a>? <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%94%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%A4%D1%91%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Достоевский, Фёдор Михайлович">Ф. М. Достоевский</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:идиот.html>Идиот</a>», <span class="example-date">1869</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">― <a href = vnd.unilang:думать.html>Ду́мал</a>, ― <a href = vnd.unilang:тихо.html>ти́хо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ответить.html>отве́тил</a> Алеша. <a href = vnd.unilang:даже.html>Да́же</a> Ракитин <a href = vnd.unilang:смутиться.html>смути́лся</a>. ― <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>Что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ты</a>? <a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>Да</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:неужто.html>неу́жто</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уж.html>уж</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:думать.html>ду́мал</a>? ― <a href = vnd.unilang:вскричать.html>вскрича́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%94%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%A4%D1%91%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Достоевский, Фёдор Михайлович">Ф. <head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неузнаваемость.html>неузнава́емость</a> (20163)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>уз</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>е<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мость</b>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:неузнаваемый.html>неузнава́емый</a></b>

</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

***неуклонно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуклонно.html>неуклонно</a> (13838)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">неукло́нный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neuklónnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуклонно.html>неукло́нно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neuklónno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:steadily.html>steadily</a>, relentlessly
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:если.html>е́сли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>мы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пустить.html>пу́стим</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самотек.html>самотёк</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:процент.html>проце́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:реальный.html>реа́льных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:потенциальный.html>потенциа́льных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:алкоголик.html>алкого́ликов</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бу́дет</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:неуклонно.html>неукло́нно</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:расти.html>расти́</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Jésli <a href = vnd.unilang:my.html>my</a> pústim vsjó éto <a href = vnd.unilang:na.html>na</a> samotjók, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> procént reálʹnyx <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> potɛnciálʹnyx alkogólikov búdet <b>neuklónno</b> rastí</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:if.html>If</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:we.html>we</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:let.html>let</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:run.html>run</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:its.html>its</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:course.html>course</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:percentage.html>percentage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:actual.html>actual</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:potential.html>potential</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:alcoholic.html>alcoholics</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:will.html>will</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:increase.html>increase</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:steadily.html>steadily</a></b></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>steadfastly
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">Саратовцы <a href = vnd.unilang:опускаться.html>опуска́ются</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:турнирный.html>турни́рной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:таблица.html>табли́це</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:медленно.html>ме́дленно</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:неуклонно.html>неукло́нно</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Saratovcy opuskájutsja <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> turnírnoj tablíce médlenno, <a href = vnd.unilang:no.html>no</a> <b>neuklónno</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> Saratov (FC) players <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slowly.html>slowly</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:surely.html>surely</a></b> signing <a href = vnd.unilang:themselves.html>themselves</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:off.html>off</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:league.html>league</a> standings</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:progressively.html>progressively</a></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***неуклюже.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжий.html>неуклю́же</a> (10004)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжий.html>неуклю́жий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neukljúžij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-e</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

</p>
<ol><li>clumsily, awkwardly, uncouthly <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:do.html>done</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:without.html>without</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:care.html>care</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:finesse.html>finesse</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:often.html>often</a> hurriedly <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> awkwardly</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ук.html>ук</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лю́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>, определительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-неуклюж-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b>.

***неуклюжесть.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжесть.html>неуклю́жесть</a> (28273)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ук.html>ук</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лю́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:жесть.html>жесть</a></b>

Зализняка).

***неуклюжий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжий.html>неуклю́жий</a> (6886)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжий.html>неуклю́жий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neukljúžij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:clumsy.html>clumsy</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:awkward.html>awkward</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неловкий.html>нело́вкий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nelóvkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ук.html>ук</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лю́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>жий</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i><a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжий.html>неуклю́жее</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжий.html>неуклю́жей</a>.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-неуклюж-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***неукоснительно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неукоснительно.html>неукосни́тельно</a> (18404)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">неукосни́тельный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neukosnítelʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неукоснительно.html>неукосни́тельно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neukosnítelʹno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:strictly.html>strictly</a>, rigorously</li>
<li>unfailingly</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">неукосни́тельный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">neukosnítelʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">укосня́ть</span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ukosnjátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">укосни́ть</span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ukosnítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:коса.html>кос</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a>
</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>, определительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-неукоснительн-</b>; суффикс: <b>-о</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>нареч.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> неукоснительный; <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:допускать.html>допуска́я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уклонение.html>уклоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отступление.html>отступле́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> чего-либо <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:целый.html>це́лое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:утро.html>у́тро</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сидеть.html>сиди́т</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:окно.html>окна</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:неукоснительно.html>неукосни́тельно</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:наблюдать.html>наблюда́ет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всем</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:делаться.html>де́лается</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двор.html>дворе́</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%98%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Гончаров, Иван Александрович"><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. ***неукротимый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неукротимый.html>неукроти́мый</a> (17595)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ne-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">укроти́мый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ukrotímyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неукротимый.html>неукроти́мый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neukrotímyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)неукроти́мее</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)неукроти́мей</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:indomitable.html>indomitable</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:invincible.html>invincible</a>, untameable</li>
<li>uncontrollable</li></ol>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:кроткий.html>кро́ткий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">krótkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:кротость.html>кро́тость</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">krótostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ук.html>ук</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ро<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ти.html>ти́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>неукроти́мее, неукроти́мей.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вки</a>: <b>не-у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-крот-</b>; суффикс: <b>-им</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трудно.html>тру́дно</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:невозможно.html>невозмо́жно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:укротить.html>укроти́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:усмирить.html>усмири́ть</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:очень.html>о́чень</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сильный.html>си́льный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайный.html>чрезвыча́йный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пени</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>своего́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:проявление.html>проявле́ния</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:неудержимый.html>неудержи́мый</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:периодический.html>Периоди́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несчастье.html>несча́стья</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:ураган.html>урага́н</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:нашествие.html>наше́ствие</a> древоточца, повышенье <a href = vnd.unilang:грунтовый.html>грунто́вых</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вода.html>вод</a> — приостанавливали <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́ту</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:безмолвный.html>безмо́лвную</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:почти.html>почти́</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:неукротимый.html>неукроти́мую</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:гонка.html>го́нку</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:солнце.html>со́лнцу</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:вечный.html>ве́чную</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гонка.html>го́нку</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:живой.html>живы́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сок.html>со́ков</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:земля.html>земли</a>! <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ви́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мый</b>

Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вки</a>: <b>не-у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-лов-</b>; суффикс: <b>-им</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***неумело.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неумело.html>неуме́ло</a> (12084)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неумелый.html>неуме́лый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neumélyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неумело.html>неуме́ло</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neumélo</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>clumsily, ineptly</li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неумело.html>неуме́ло</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neumélo</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:short.html>short</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:neuter.html>neuter</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неумелый.html>неуме́лый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neumélyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

***неуместно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>неуместно</a> (22399)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>неуместно</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***неуместный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>неуме́стный</a> (9245)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ne-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уместный.html>уме́стный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">uméstnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>неуме́стный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neuméstnyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)неуме́стнее</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)неуме́стней</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>misplaced, <a href = vnd.unilang:inappropriate.html>inappropriate</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:out.html>out</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:place.html>place</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:unsuitable.html>unsuitable</a>, unfitting, <a href = vnd.unilang:irrelevant.html>irrelevant</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>неуме́стное</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:замечание.html>замеча́ние</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>neuméstnoje</b> zamečánije</i> ― <span class="e-translation">untimely <a href = vnd.unilang:remark.html>remark</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:здесь.html>здесь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>неуме́стно</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">zdesʹ éto <b>neuméstno</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:out.html>out</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:place.html>place</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:here.html>here</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">неподоба́ющий</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nepodobájuščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:место.html>ме́сто</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mésto</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:место.html>ме́ст</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>неуме́стнее, неуме́стней.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вки</a>: <b>не-у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мест-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обстановка.html>обстано́вке</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:являться.html>явля́ющийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:некстати.html>некста́ти</a>, неподобающий <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>Неуме́стный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вопрос.html>вопро́с</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>Неуме́стное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:любопытство.html>любопы́тство</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:ваш.html>Ва́ше</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:присутствие.html>прису́тствие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:здесь.html>здесь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуместный.html>неуместно</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A2%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%98%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Тургенев, Иван Сергеевич"><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. ***неумный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неумный.html>неу́мный</a> (20472)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неумный.html>неу́мный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neúmnyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:no.html>no</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:stupid.html>stupid</a>, unintelligent</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ум.html>у́м</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-ум-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:недостаточно.html>недоста́точно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:умный.html>у́мный</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:довольно.html>дово́льно</a> <a href = <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:неумолимый.html>неумоли́мый</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>неумоли́мее, неумоли́мей.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вки</a>: <b>не-у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мол-</b>; суффикс: <b>-им</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трудно.html>тру́дно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:невозможно.html>невозмо́жно</a> умолить, <a href = vnd.unilang:упросить.html>упроси́ть</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:безжалостный.html>безжа́лостный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:непреклонный.html>непрекло́нный</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:невозможно.html>невозмо́жно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отменить.html>отмени́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нарушить.html>нару́шить</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:неотвратимый.html>неотврати́мый</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:непреложный.html>непрело́жный</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:безжалостный.html>безжа́лостный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:непреклонный.html>непрекло́нный</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:неотвратимый.html>неотврати́мый</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:непреложный.html>непрело́жный</a></li></ol>
</body>

***неуправляемый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуправляемый.html>неуправля́емый</a> (19534)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

***неуравновешенный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неуравновешенный.html>неуравнове́шенный</a> (29682)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>рав<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>шен<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>(1).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вки</a>: <b>не-у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-равн-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-веш-</b>; суффикс: <b>-енн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***неурочный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неурочный.html>неуро́чный</a> (23107)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>у·ро́ч<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-уроч-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="книжное">книжн.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:несвоевременный.html>несвоевре́менный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неожиданный.html>неожи́данный</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:происходящий.html>происходя́щий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> неподобающее <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мя</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́тот</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:неурочный.html>неуро́чный</a> </span> <a href = vnd.unilang:визит.html>визи́т</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:удивить.html>удиви́л</a> Элис, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>она́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:осведомиться.html>осве́домилась</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>чём</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дело.html>де́ло</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. ***неурядица.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неурядица.html>неуря́дица</a> (22025)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неурядица.html>неуря́дица</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neurjádica</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неурядица.html>неуря́дицы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неурядица.html>неуря́дицы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неурядица.html>неуря́диц</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:confusion.html>confusion</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:disorder.html>disorder</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:mess.html>mess</a></li>
<li><i>(usually <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a>)</i> squabbling, arguing</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ря́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ди.html>ди</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ца</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 5a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-уряд-</b>; суффикс: <b>-иц</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***неустанно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неустанно.html>неуста́нно</a> (17936)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неустанный.html>неуста́нный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">neustánnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неустанно.html>неуста́нно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">neustánno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:constantly.html>constantly</a>, incessantly, relentlessly</li>
<li>tirelessly</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неустанный.html>неуста́нный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">neustánnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:стан.html>ста́н</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-уста-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-нн-о</b>.
</p>

***неустанный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:неустанный.html>неуста́нный</a> (27742)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:недопить.html>не-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ne-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уста.html>уст</a>(а́ть)</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ust(átʹ)</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-а́нный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ánnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>

</p>
